/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees and grass, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day. On the right side of the street, there are several tents set up, possibly indicating some sort of outdoor event or market. The colors in the image are predominantly green and brown, reflecting the natural elements of the scene. The overall atmosphere is peaceful and inviting, a typical characteristic of a sunny day in Beijing.
